experiences.title: Full Stack Web Developer
experiences.details: The program covered a full stack of development concepts, and I completed the program with the fundamental skills for front-end and back-end development, including:  Computer Science applied to JavaScript, browser Based Technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery), Deployment, Databases (MySQL, MongoDB), Server Side Development (Node.js, Express, MERN Stack) ,Quality Assurance

experiences.title: P.E. Teacher
experiences.details: I am a physical education teacher for middle and primary school students.  I make athletics fun so it is enjoyable to learn for everyone.
